unnormalised: Rental Agreements: Getting it Right, Bhai!
normalised: Rental Agreements: Getting it Right, Brother!

unnormalised: Landlords and tenants, listen up! With the festive season around the corner and folks moving for jobs, rental agreements are hotter than a Mumbai chai. But are you signing on the dotted line without reading the fine print? Don't be a bakra!
normalised: Landlords and tenants, listen up! With the festive season around the corner and folks moving for jobs, rental agreements are hotter than a Mumbai chai. But are you signing on the dotted line without reading the fine print? Don't be a bakra!

unnormalised: Recent reports suggest a rise in disputes, often due to poorly drafted agreements. Advocate Sharma from Delhi High Court advises, "Get EVERYTHING in writing! Rent amount (Rs. 15,000, for instance), maintenance charges, security deposit (Rs. 30,000, maybe?), lock-in period... the works!"
normalised: Recent reports suggest a rise in disputes, often due to poorly drafted agreements. Advocate Sharma from Delhi High Court advises, "Get EVERYTHING in writing! Rent amount (rupees fifteen thousand, for instance), maintenance charges, security deposit (rupees thirty thousand, maybe?), lock-in period... the works!"

unnormalised: Think beyond the basics. What about parking? Can Priya Aunty's Pomeranian visit? Is drilling allowed to hang that beautiful Tanjore painting? Spell. It. Out!
normalised: Think beyond the basics. What about parking? Can Priya Aunty's Pomeranian visit? Is drilling allowed to hang that beautiful Tanjore painting? Spell. It. Out!

unnormalised: Also, verify the landlord's ownership. Dr. Reddy, a real estate expert in Bangalore, warns against fraudulent property listings. “Do your due diligence, especially online. See the original documents”. A well-defined agreement covering everything from repaint costs to carpet area (say, 600 sq ft) can save you a lot of headaches (and Rs.!). So, before you celebrate Diwali in your new pad, get that agreement sorted! Happy renting, folks!
